title: ISic000267. I.Sicily inscription 000267
body:
Facsimile Images

1MESSIAEPRISCIFILCRISPINAE
2FLAMINICAEDIVAEAUG
3EXTESTAMENTOMESSIMODIANIPATRIS
4MODIANUSFRATER

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon Bitto 2001 and CIL

English translation

To Messia Crispina, daughter of Priscus, flaminica of Diva Augusta. Her brother Modianus set it up by the will of his father Messius Modianus.

commentary

bibliography
